word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指巨大或超人的力量。
指机体内部的能力，是依靠身体组织而存在的力，经使用就变为force。
最普通用词，泛指一切力量或能力等。
指由生命元气的存在所产生的活力、精力。
着重指克服障碍，推动人或物朝所要求的方向运动或能产生明显效应的力量。
用于人时，指工作时焕发出的精力或干劲。

bilingual.source: Doing exercise will also give you energy.
Making a paper bag uses more energy.
bilingual.target: 制作纸袋消耗更多能量。

bilingual.source: It gives us energy for the whole morning.
bilingual.target: 它给我们一整个上午的能量。

bilingual.source: Making a paper bag uses four times as much energy.
bilingual.target: 制作纸袋消耗的能量是塑料袋的四倍。

bilingual.source: You have enough drinking water and some healthy, high-energy snacks.
bilingual.target: 你有足够的饮用水和一些健康的高能量零食。

bilingual.source: The less energy you use, the less carbon dioxide is released.
bilingual.target: 使用的能量越少，释放的二氧化碳越少。

bilingual.source: Breakfast is important because it gives us energy for the morning.
bilingual.target: 早餐很重要，因为它给我们早晨提供能量。

bilingual.source: Vegetables will also give you the energy your body needs after your fast.
bilingual.target: 蔬菜还会为你禁食后提供身体所需的能量。

bilingual.source: Many people enjoy herbal tea because it can have a positive effect on energy levels.
bilingual.target: 许多人喜欢草药茶，因为它能提高能量水平。

list.abstract: ENERGY（英 [ˈenədʒi]，美 [ˈenərdʒi]），英语单词，作名词为活力、干劲、能量。短语搭配有clean energy（绿色能源）。例句为“No energy, no motivation and zero fulfilment .（没有精力，没有动力，没有成就感。）” 该词复数形式为energies，近义词有vitality、spirit、soul等。
ENERGY是中国台湾男子流行乐组合，于2002年7月成立，由张书伟、萧景鸿、谢坤达、唐振刚四人组成。 该组合于2003年凭借专辑《E3》获得第15届金曲奖“最佳重唱团体”荣誉，随后还获得第11届全球华语音乐榜中榜“最佳组合”、第4届全球华语歌曲排行榜“最受欢迎歌唱组合”等奖项，于2009年宣布单飞。

yingyinNormal.en: Plant cells make energy a different way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 植物细胞通过不同的形式制造能量。

yingyinNormal.en: The purple bacteria live by harnessing energy from the sun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种紫色的细菌依靠吸收太阳的能量而生长。

yingyinNormal.en: Eating gives me energy. And I need energy for my fun run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 食物给我能量。而我正需要能量参加募捐长跑。

yingyinNormal.en: I will destroy you. I am energy, you can't destroy energy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要打败你的。我是一个能量体，你无法打败能量体。

yingyinNormal.en: They have chloroplasts that combine carbon dioxide and water with light energy from the sun to create oxygen and sugar, a form of chemical energy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们有叶绿体。叶绿体把二氧化碳和水份与太阳光能量合成氧气与糖份，一种化学能量。

yingyinNormal.en: Even though we see them all around us, the total energy density of these components is actually very small, around 5% of the total energy of the universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尽管它们就在我们的周围，但这些组成部分的总能量密度却十分渺小，它们仅占整个宇宙总能量的5%左右。

yingyinNormal.en: They harness light from a star, bringing energy to our world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 绿色植物吸收日光，为地球带来能量。

yingyinNormal.en: That process also creates a high energy molecule, called ATP which the cell uses to power all of its parts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个过程同时制造出一个高能量分子，叫做三磷酸腺苷，为细胞供给能量所用。

yingyinNormal.en: She's always going on about the flow of energy, the spirits of animals.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她总是执着于能量流动，还有动物的灵魂。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the Tesseract. It has the potential energy to wipe out the planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个叫做宇宙魔方，这东西有着摧毁地球的能量。

yingyinNormal.en: The remaining 68% of the energy density of the universe is made up of dark energy, which is even more mysterious than dark matter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 剩余68%的宇宙能量密度来自于暗能量，这种物质比暗物质更加神秘。

yingyinNormal.en: I had this space designed for open energy and open conversation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我设计这个空间就是让大家有开放的能量，以及开放性的交流。

yingyinNormal.en: Just before sunrise this morning, a large surge of energy was detected in Paris.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就在今天黎明之前，巴黎探测到一股强大的能量波。

yingyinNormal.en: I think if it were exposed to a sufficiently powerful energy source something very similar to its own signature, perhaps its molecular integrity could fail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得如果它遭遇足够强大的能量源特性类似其本身的能量，那或许它的分子完整性就会被破坏。

yingyinNormal.en: Where did the cell get the energy to do all this? That's the role of the mitochondria.
yingyinNormal.zh: 细胞在哪里找来能量去做这些事情？那是线粒体的功能。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a rock 65 feet in diameter, and when it explodes in midair, it releases more than 20 times the energy of the bomb dropped on Hiroshima.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个直径65英尺的陨石，当它在半空爆炸时，它释放的能量超过在广岛投下的原子弹爆炸能量的20倍。

yingyinNormal.en: Just under 27% of the rest of the energy density of the universe is made up of what we call dark matter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其他近27%的宇宙能量密度是由暗物质构成的。

yingyinNormal.en: Inside this structure, the energy of two photons is used to split a water molecule.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这个复合体中，两个光子放射出的能量就可以使一个水分子分解。

yingyinNormal.en: Your heart beats faster, your pupils dilate, and your body releases glucose for additional energy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的心跳加速，瞳孔放大，身体释放出葡萄糖以产生额外的能量。

yingyinNormal.en: I would guess a wave-function and then vary its parameters until I found the lowest energy solution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会任意猜测一个基态波函数，通过更改其参数找出能量最低的量子态。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 精力; 活力; 力量

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 精力充沛的；充满活力的；需要剧烈活动的；高能的；能量的

word_family.mean: n. 活力；干劲；能；能量；能级；精力；力量

examination_example.sentence: Companies can also optimize their own <highlight>energy</highlight> use and cut down on the cost of electricity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司也可以优化自己的能源使用，降低电力成本。

examination_example.sentence: There is a shortage of clean <highlight>energy</highlight> supply.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 清洁能源供应短缺。

examination_example.sentence: In many parts of the world renewable <highlight>energy</highlight> is already a principal <highlight>energy</highlight> source.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在世界许多地方，可再生能源已经是一种主要的能源。

sense_info_list.en: a healthy capacity for vigorous activity
sense_info_list.zh: 精力; 活力; 力量

examination_example.sentence: In order to make the most of our focus and <highlight>energy</highlight>, we also need to embrace downtime, or as Newport suggests, "be lazy".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了充分利用我们的注意力和精力，我们还需要拥抱停机时间，或者像Newport建议的那样，“偷懒”。

examination_example.sentence: You can gather all of the enthusiasm and <highlight>energy</highlight> you can, put on a big smile and say "Hi".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽你最大努力聚集所有的热情和精力，摆出一个灿烂的笑容，说“嗨”。

examination_example.sentence: There were goals, there were strategies, there were objectives, but we didn't talk about <highlight>energy</highlight>; we didn't talk about passion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那时候用的是“目标”、“战略”和“目的”。但是那时候人们不会谈论“精力”，不会谈论”激情“

sense_info_list.en: a thermodynamic quantity equivalent to the capacity of a physical system to do work; the units of energy are joules or ergs

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: This ban is being discussed and implemented is because <highlight>energy</highlight> officials see that they will not reach their emissions goals by 2050.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 讨论和实施这项禁令的原因是，能源官员预见他们将无法在2050年达到排放目标。

examination_example.sentence: Companies, which have long viewed batteries and alternative forms of <highlight>energy</highlight> as a threat, are learning to embrace the technologies as enabling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使是长期以来视电池和替代能源为威胁的公司也正试着接受这些技术，将其视为促进。

examination_example.sentence: More and more people become "prosumers," who produce and consume their own <highlight>energy</highlight> on-site.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的人成为就地生产和消费能源的“生产消费者”。

examination_example.sentence: One thing remains clear; The future of <highlight>energy</highlight> is in how we store it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一件事是可以肯定的: 能源的未来在于我们如何储存能源。

examination_example.sentence: Today's battery breakthroughs come as the world looks to expand modern <highlight>energy</highlight> access to the billion or so people without it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，电池技术的突破正值世界寻求将现代能源扩展到大约10亿没有现代能源的人。

sense_info_list.en: a healthy capacity for vigorous activity

examination_example.sentence: I'm robbing myself of the <highlight>energy</highlight> to focus on the things that matter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我剥夺了自己关注重要事情的精力。

examination_example.sentence: There's something about the founder's <highlight>energy</highlight> and enthusiasm that infects the rest of the team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 创始人的活力和热情感染了团队的其他成员。

sense_info_list.en: an imaginative lively style, especially style of writing
a thermodynamic quantity equivalent to the capacity of a physical system to do work; the units of energy are joules or ergs

word_usage.usage: energy的基本意思是“力量，活力，干劲”，多用作不可数名词；在指人的“精力”时，多用复数形式。引申可表示“能量，能源”，为不可数名词。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 用于人时, 指工作时焕发出的精力或干劲。
着重指克服障碍, 推动人或物朝所要求的方向运动或能产生明显效应的力量。
多指巨大或超人的力量。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 活力；干劲；能；能量；能级；精力；力量

examination_example.sentence: When we think of animals and plants, we have a pretty good way of dividing them into two distinct groups one converts sunlight into <highlight>energy</highlight> and the other has to eat food to make its <highlight>energy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们想到动植物时，我们有一个很好的方法将它们分为两个不同的类别，一个将阳光转化为能量，另一组必须吃食物来能制造量。

examination_example.sentence: Imagine a world where building the tallest skyscraper wasn't a race of height, but rather one to collect the most solar <highlight>energy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下，这个世界上的摩天大楼不是一场高度竞赛，而是一场收集太阳能多少的较量 。

examination_example.sentence: Changing building codes, evolving tastes, and the high cost of maintaining those wonderful old signs have businesses embracing LEDs, which are <highlight>energy</highlight> efficient, but still carry great cost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不断变化的建筑规范、人们越来越高的品味、再加上维护这些色彩缤纷但又老旧的标牌的高昂成本都促使企业开始接受LED灯，虽然LED灯节省能源，但成本依然很高。

examination_example.sentence: Green buildings like this aren't necessarily cost-efficient for the investor, but it does produce much less pollution than that caused by <highlight>energy</highlight> production through fossil fuels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对投资者来说，这样的环保建筑不一定具有成本效益，但它产生的污染远少于通过化石燃料产出能源所造成的污染。

sense_info_list.en: a thermodynamic quantity equivalent to the capacity of a physical system to do work; the units of energy are joules or ergs

examination_example.sentence: "The body uses a lot of <highlight>energy</highlight> stores for growth and repair through the night," explains diet specialist Sarah Elder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 营养学家 Sarah Elder 解释说，“在夜间，身体使用了大量的能量储备进行生长和修复。”

examination_example.sentence: The sea slugs are so good at gathering <highlight>energy</highlight> from the sun that they can live up to nine months without having to eat any food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些海姑蚧非常擅长从太阳中收集能量，这样它们可以在不吃任何食物的情况下存活9个月之久。

examination_example.sentence: Their babies retain the ability to produce their own chlorophyll, though they can't generate <highlight>energy</highlight> from sunlight until they've eaten enough algae to steal the necessary genes, which they can't yet produce on their own.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们的后代延续了这种可以自己制造叶绿素的能力，尽管直到它们吃掉足够多的藻类以获取这种必要的基因(它们还无法自己制造这种基因)，它们才能够从阳光中制造能量。

sense_info_list.en: a healthy capacity for vigorous activity

examination_example.sentence: Then I can devote more time and <highlight>energy</highlight> to finding a better position at another company.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我可以投入更多的时间和精力在另一家公司找到更好的职位。

examination_example.sentence: It is not worth it to waste our physical, intellectual and spiritual <highlight>energy</highlight> worrying about things that are beyond our control.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 浪费我们的体力、智力和心灵能量去担心我们无法控制的事情是不值得的。

examination_example.sentence: It saves their <highlight>energy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样可以节省他们的精力。

sense_info_list.en: a person's physical and mental powers; typically as applied to a particular task or activity

word_usage.usage: energy的基本意思是“力量，活力，干劲”，多用作不可数名词；在指人的“精力”时，多用复数形式。引申可表示“能量，能源”，为不可数名词。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 用于人时，指工作时焕发出的精力或干劲。
着重指克服障碍，推动人或物朝所要求的方向运动或能产生明显效应的力量。
多指巨大或超人的力量。

examination_example.sentence: We all need to get involved in saving <highlight>energy</highlight> whether it's at work, at home, or at school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是在工作中，在家里，还是在学校，我们都需要参与到节能中来。

examination_example.sentence: This method provided a readout for how home <highlight>energy</highlight> use has evolved since the early 1990s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种方法为20世纪90年代初以来家庭能源使用的演变提供了一种解读。

examination_example.sentence: Although exhausting, it gave me <highlight>energy</highlight>, enthusiasm and happiness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然很累，但它给我带来了活力、热情和幸福。

examination_example.sentence: She was filled with <highlight>energy</highlight>, enthusiasm and happiness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她充满了活力、热情和幸福。

examination_example.sentence: Things quickly got very intense due to the huge amount of <highlight>energy</highlight> required to look after them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于照顾他们需要大量的精力，事情很快变得非常紧张。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But without sunshine, there is no solar <highlight>energy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是没有阳光，就没有太阳能。

examination_example.sentence: How can we make better use of tidal <highlight>energy</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们如何能更好地利用潮汐能？

examination_example.sentence: But the technology they use requires a lot of <highlight>energy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是他们使用的技术需要大量的能量。

sense_info_list.en: a healthy capacity for vigorous activity
sense_info_list.zh: 精力; 活力; 力量

examination_example.sentence: He seems to have too much <highlight>energy</highlight>, and never stops running or shouting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他似乎精力过剩，从不停止奔跑或叫喊。

examination_example.sentence: Taking exercise is the best way to get <highlight>energy</highlight> again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 锻炼是恢复精力的最好方法。

examination_example.sentence: Your <highlight>energy</highlight>, attention and memory all go down when you don't sleep well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你睡不好的时候，你的精力、注意力和记忆力都会下降。

word_usage.usage: energy的基本意思是“力量，活力，干劲”，多用作不可数名词；在指人的“精力”时，多用复数形式。引申可表示“能量，能源”，为不可数名词。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 用于人时，指工作时焕发出的精力或干劲。
着重指克服障碍，推动人或物朝所要求的方向运动或能产生明显效应的力量。
多指巨大或超人的力量。
